description.short: Describes a Serial device, including ID, name and path.
description.full: This describes a Serial device, what ID it has, what name it has, and the path to the device.

methods.name: getDeviceID
methods.short:
Gets the ID of the device

Example: 0,1,2,3 etc.

Returns: the device ID.

methods.name: getDeviceName
methods.short:
Gets the name of the device

Example: usbdevice-a440 or COM4.

Returns: the device name.

methods.name: getDevicePath
methods.short:
Gets the path to the device

Example: /dev/tty.cu/usbdevice-a440.

Returns: the device path.

methods.name: ofSerialDeviceInfo
methods.parameters: string devicePathIn, string deviceNameIn, int deviceIDIn
methods.short:
Construct an ofSerialDeviceInfo with parameters.

Parameters:

devicePathIn The path to the device.

deviceNameIn The name of the device.

deviceIDIn The ID of the device.

document:
#class ofSerialDeviceInfo

<!-- visible: True advanced: False istemplated: False _extends: _ -->

##InlineDescription

Describes a Serial device, including ID, name and path.

##Description

This describes a Serial device, what ID it has, what name it has, and the path to the device.

##Methods

###int getDeviceID()

<!-- syntax: getDeviceID() name: getDeviceID returns: int _returns_description: _ _parameters: _ access: public version_started: 007 _version_deprecated: _ _summary: _ constant: False static: False visible: True advanced: False -->

_inlined_description: _

Gets the ID of the device

Example: 0,1,2,3 etc.

Returns: the device ID.

_description: _

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->

###string getDeviceName()

<!-- syntax: getDeviceName() name: getDeviceName returns: string _returns_description: _ _parameters: _ access: public version_started: 007 _version_deprecated: _ _summary: _ constant: False static: False visible: True advanced: False -->

Example: usbdevice-a440 or COM4.

Returns: the device name.

_description: _

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->

###string getDevicePath()

<!-- syntax: getDevicePath() name: getDevicePath returns: string _returns_description: _ _parameters: _ access: public version_started: 007 _version_deprecated: _ _summary: _ constant: False static: False visible: True advanced: False -->

_inlined_description: _

Gets the path to the device

Example: /dev/tty.cu/usbdevice-a440.

Returns: the device path.

_description: _

##InlineDescription

Describes a Serial device, including ID, name and path.





##Description

This describes a Serial device, what ID it has, what name it has, and the path to the device.





##Methods



###int getDeviceID()

<!--

_visible: True_
_advanced: False_
-->

_inlined_description: _

Gets the ID of the device

Example: `0`,`1`,`2`,`3` etc.


**Returns**: the device ID.





_description: _
